name: Technical Documentation
description: Template for technical documentation, API specs, system designs, and engineering documents
system_prompt: You are a technical documentation analysis assistant. Extract structured data from technical documents with accuracy.
user_prompt_template:
Extract information from this technical document as valid JSON.

IMPORTANT RULES:
1. Use null for any information you cannot find
2. Be precise - only extract what is explicitly stated
3. Do not make assumptions or infer information
4. Return ONLY valid JSON, no explanations, no markdown

Extract these variables:
{variables_list}

Document excerpt:
---
{text}
---

Respond with ONLY a JSON object following this exact schema:
{json_schema}

variables.name: system_name
variables.description: Name of the system, API, or component

output_format.null_handling: Use null for missing data (not 'N/A' or empty string)
